name: Link
shortdesc: A link to a placed file.

property.name: AFTER_NEW
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a Link is created. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_DELETE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a Link is deleted. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_DELETE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a Link is deleted. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_UPDATE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a Link is updated. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_UPDATE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a Link is updated. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_EMBED
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a Link is embedded. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_EMBED
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a Link is embedded. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_UNEMBED
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a Link is unembedded. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_UNEMBED
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a Link is unembedded. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_MOVE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a Link is relocated from one object to another. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_MOVE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a Link is relocated from one object to another. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_ATTRIBUTE_CHANGED
property.shortdesc: Dispatched when the value of a property changes on this Link. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: versionState
property.shortdesc: The Version Cue version state of the file.

property.name: editingState
property.shortdesc: The Version Cue editing state of the file.

property.name: linkXmp
property.shortdesc: XMP data for the link source file.

property.name: index
property.shortdesc: The index of the link in the links collection.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The linked object. Can return: Story, Graphic, Movie or Sound.

property.name: assetURL
property.shortdesc: The asset URL of the linked object.

property.name: assetID
property.shortdesc: The asset ID of the linked object.

property.name: edited
property.shortdesc: If true, indicates the linked object has been edited in the current document but the source file has not been updated.

property.name: name
property.shortdesc: The name of the Link.

property.name: needed
property.shortdesc: If true, indicates a link to a full-resolution version of the source file is needed. If false, indicates the object is embedded.

property.name: status
property.shortdesc: The status of the link.

property.name: linkType
property.shortdesc: The file type of the linked object.

property.name: date
property.shortdesc: The date and time the Link was created.

property.name: size
property.shortdesc: The size of the Link file.

property.name: filePath
property.shortdesc: The file path (colon delimited on the Mac OS). Can also accept: File.

property.name: id
property.shortdesc: The unique ID of the Link.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: events
property.shortdesc: A collection of events.

property.name: eventListeners
property.shortdesc: A collection of event listeners.

property.name: preferences
property.shortdesc: A collection of preferences objects.

property.name: links
property.shortdesc: A collection of links.

property.name: label
property.shortdesc: A property that can be set to any string.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: relink
method.shortdesc: Points the link to a new source file.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The full path name of the new source file. Can accept: File or String.

method.name: unlink
method.shortdesc: Embeds the source file in the document.

method.name: update
method.shortdesc: Updates the link if the source file has been changed.

method.name: unembed
method.shortdesc: Unembeds the source file. If no folder is specified, creates a link to the original source file; if a folder is specified, copies the file to the folder and creates a link to the copied file.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The folder to which to copy the unembedded file. (Optional)

parameters.name: forceSave
parameters.shortdesc: If true, forcibly saves a version. (Optional)

method.name: editOriginal
method.shortdesc: Opens the source file of the link in the default editor for the source file type.

method.name: revealInSystem
method.shortdesc: Opens the file system to the folder that contains the source file of the link, and selects the file.

method.name: revealInBridge
method.shortdesc: Opens Adobe Bridge and selects the source file of the link.

method.name: copyLink
method.shortdesc: Copies the link file to the specified location.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The file or folder to which to copy the file.

parameters.name: forceSave
parameters.shortdesc: If true, forcibly saves a version. (Optional)

method.name: goToSource
method.shortdesc: Opens the source file of the link in InDesign for SharedContent links.

method.name: insertLabel
method.shortdesc: Sets the label to the value associated with the specified key.

method.name: extractLabel
method.shortdesc: Gets the label value associated with the specified key.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Link.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
